flawed_nl_solution:
After the first segment, there are 100 - 10 = <<100-10=90>>90 racers left in the race.
After the second segment, 90 / 3 = <<90/3=30>>30 racers are eliminated.
This leaves 90 - 30 = <<90-30=62>>62 racers to compete in the third segment.
After the third segment, 62 / 2 = <<62/2=31>>31 more racers are eliminated.
This leaves 62 - 31 = <<62-31=31>>31 racers to run in the final section of the race.
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 62. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
